items.name: Circle of Flame
items.note: Also good on hybrid specs as it only takes 2 ticks to refill.

items.name: Energized Retinal Armor
items.note: Requires 75 MoP engi to make. Requires 75 cata engi to place the sockets. **Alliance:** [Billibub Cogspinner](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=5519) **Horde:** [Sovik](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=3413)

items.name: Hood of Alchemical Vapors
items.note: Farmable on lvl 21-22 for ilvl 28. Level 20 drops ilvl 26.

items.name: Terrorcloth Mantle
items.note: Can proc blue/purple. Slightly inferior to Hallowed but way easier to get.

items.name: Mana-Etched Spaulders
items.note: Only useful for the 2-piece set bonus. Otherwise Hallowed Pauldrons are better.

items.name: Raiments of Divine Authority
items.note: Hallowed and Incanter are better but you can queue Blood Furnace from the dungeon finder.

items.name: Mana-Etched Gloves
items.note: Only good with the 2-piece set bonus.

items.name: Gholamcloth Wrap
items.note: Can proc blue/purple making it a very good item.

items.name: Grovetender's Cummerbund
items.note: Socket proc chance is ~5%. Drops loot once a day.

items.name: Aran's Sorcerous Slacks
items.note: Only good for crit/haste and full crit builds. Don't put versatility gems it's not worth it - use Pontifex instead.

items.name: Ro'gor's Slippers of Silence
items.note: Socket proc chance is ~5%. Drops loot once a day.

items.name: Agile Retinal Armor
items.note: Requires 75 MoP engi to make. Requires 75 cata engi to place the sockets. **Alliance:** [Billibub Cogspinner](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=5519) **Horde:** [Sovik](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=3413)

items.name: Zom's Misty Hood
items.note: ilvl 28 farmable on lvl 22, ilvl 26 - on 20

items.name: Auchenai Monk's Tunic
items.note: Moonglade Robe is better but this is a quest reward.

items.name: Ranja-Hide Bracers
items.note: You can only loot this once.

items.name: Wastewalker Gloves
items.note: Only good for the 2-piece set bonus.

items.name: Temptessa's Knee-High Boots
items.note: Socket proc chance is ~5%. Drops loot once a day.

items.name: Helmet of the Constructor

items.name: Reinforced Retinal Armor
items.note: Requires 75 MoP engi to make. Requires 75 cata engi to place the sockets. **Alliance:** [Billibub Cogspinner](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=5519) **Horde:** [Sovik](https://www.wowhead.com/npc=3413)

items.name: Davidian's All-Seeing Eyes
items.note: Tooltip is wrong. Requires a lvl 22 character to farm. Best spot to farm is goats in Vallet of Four Winds.

items.name: Light-Sealed Casque
items.note: ilvl 28 requires a lvl 22 farmer, ilvl 26 - a lvl 22 one

items.name: Endwyn's Toothy Visage
items.note: ilvl 28 requires a lvl 22 farmer, ilvl 26 - a lvl 22 one

items.name: Doomplate Shoulderguards
items.note: Only good with the set bonus. Use the gloves.

items.name: Doomplate Gauntlets
items.note: Only good with the socket bonus. Use with shoulders.

items.note: Socket proc chance is ~5%. Drops loot once a day. The rare is very hard to solo at 20.
